item.title: Trump tells Americans to 'hang tough' as universal tariffs take effect
item.description: President Trump told Americans to "hang tough" Saturday as some of the tariffs he announced on Wednesday go into effect.

item.title: Elon Musk knocks Peter Navarro over education, experience
item.description: Elon Musk criticized fellow Trump ally and administration official Peter Navarro after an X user complimented his tariff explanation.
